casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 16, 2015. Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lane, Eric Glenn. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of December 2015 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of December 2015."
